channel.title: CrisisX [317 Source and Client]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/7200/projectcxr.png[/img][/center] [size=36pt]THIS IS NOT THE ACTUAL CRISISX SOURCE IT IS A REMAKE! OF AN AWESOME SERVER WHICH HAS BEEN CLOSED AND NOW RE-OPENED![/size] Yeah, I released this because of my staff member betraying me, yeah thats you Saige/Project Xml [size=24pt]This server comes with everything seen here:[/size] [size=18pt][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,537938.0.html]ProjectCxR[/url][/size] [center][anchor=media][img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/8135/mediax.png[/img] [img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/7391/torvadungeoneering.png[/img] [img]http://img213.imageshack.us/img213/4527/strykewyrms.png[/img] [img]http://img408.imageshack.us/img408/3245/shopsx.png[/img] [img]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/1982/rockcrabs.png[/img] [img]http://img824.imageshack.us/img824/3831/pestcontrolo.png[/img] [img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/134/kbdy.png[/img] [img]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/1899/huntingf.png[/img] [img]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/1418/cursesl.png[/img] [img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/5377/corporalbeast.png[/img] [img]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/7103/controlpanelb.png[/img] [img]http://img141.imageshack.us/img141/8164/barrelchest.png[/img] [img]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/7575/summoningo.png[/img] [img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/5820/playersg.png[/img] [img]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/7098/nomadx.png[/img] [img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/5552/newitemsd.png[/img] [img]http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/9837/dungeoneeringj.png[/img] [img]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/833/bossesf.png[/img][/center] I am deciding to release this before anyone else does.... Credits: %99.9 - ImDatBoss %.05 - Me, for fixing a few bugs and a few other basic things... %.04 - Ford rocks 99 - For temporarily hosting the server and fixing a few bugs and managing the server with me %.01 - sk8rdude461 - For leveling up legitimately even though he was head admin to find bugs to report to me :)
Thanks Sk8rdude461 for the website development and graphic design stuff, hope you stay with me for version 2 :)
[size=24pt]CLIENT[/size] http://up.ht/N5Kugr
[size=24pt]SOURCE[/size] http://up.ht/NPb6y0

item.dc:creator: @Mee0345 Mee0345
item.description:
@Mee0345 wrote:

Project-Xml:

Nice insanityx leech would rep –

Thanks, your the one who wanted to use it Look at the credits if you didn’t already. Or even try being bothered to read the thread, you would try to negative rep me but I already did it to you for other stuff.
Also the reason why you stopped using it was because I released it

[quote=“Whackatre, post:26, topic:448801”]That IP is a bigpond hostname (I looked it up). A home hosted VPS? Ehh.

Good to see you back on Mopar, Mee.[/quote]
Im not hosting Just protecting my hoster
Thanks, im trying to get more active on here.

ReloadZ:

Nothing like CrisisX, only reason i clicked on this.

It isn’t meant to be, I will probably start developing a CrisisX Remake but doing it solo, because it is a lot easier and I think alot more people would enjoy it.
